verbs.description: Well on his way towards [V: making] [ARG1: the U.S. a pariah among nations] , [ARG0: Donald Trump] reportedly told Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau during a heated phone exchange over trade policy that he believes Canada burned down the U.S. White House during the War ...
